lead_paragraph: The Boston Red Sox acquired left-handed reliever Fernando Abad from the Minnesota Twins for minor league pitcher Pat Light.

headline.print_headline: Red Sox Acquire Lefty Fernando Abad in Trade With Twins
headline.main: Red Sox Acquire Lefty Fernando Abad in Trade With Twins
